heading: HR01839
0: RESOLUTION OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS, TO CONDUCT A REVIEW, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, TO UPDATE THE REGULATIONS AND STANDARDS OF THE NATIONAL BUILDING CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES AND TO CALL ON THE DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS TO REVIEW AND PROPOSE COMPREHENSIVE REVISIONS IN ORDER TO ENHANCE RESILIENCE
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS since 2018-05-23
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01839
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS, TO CONDUCT A REVIEW, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, TO UPDATE THE REGULATIONS AND STANDARDS OF THE NATIONAL BUILDING CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES AND TO CALL ON THE DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS TO REVIEW AND PROPOSE COMPREHENSIVE REVISIONS IN ORDER TO ENHANCE RESILIENCE
